document.full_text: as american publishers gathered in new york this week to promote the best of what's coming in the year ahead, more and more attention was focused on the growing influence of digital publishing.
document.title: digital book companies jostle for dominance in ny
lines_and_colors: as american publishers gathered in new york this week to promote the best of what's coming in the year ahead, more and more attention was focused on the growing influence of digital publishing.
